name: tslamic
body:
### Welcome

I'm a software monkey from Slovenia, currently living in Dublin.

I work at world’s biggest poker company, creating Android apps millions of people love. When I’m not working, I like to run, read and travel.

Sometimes I [blog about stuff](http://tslamic.wordpress.com). Want to contact me? [Go right ahead!](http://tslamic.wordpress.com/contact-me/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
